tests.title: Navigation Patterns
tests.prefix: Using the top-level items in the JavaScript object [{url:'/',label:'Home'},{url:'/products',label:'Products',subnav:[{url:'/products/frobs',label:'Frobs'},{url:'/products/thrips',label:'Thrips'}]},{url:'/services',label:'Services'}]
prompts: create navigation markup
build a navigation menu
create the main nav
build an accessible navigation menu

tests.title: Basic Navigation with Current Page
tests.prefix: Using the top-level items in the JavaScript object [{url:'/',label:'Home'},{url:'/products',label:'Products',subnav:[{url:'/products/frobs',label:'Frobs'},{url:'/products/thrips',label:'Thrips'}]},{url:'/services',label:'Services'}] and assuming the current page is “Products”
prompts: create navigation markup
build a navigation menu
create the main nav
build an accessible navigation menu

build a navigation menu

prompts: create navigation markup that is shown using a button
build a navigation menu accessible via a button
create the main nav and a hamburger menu to show/hide it
build an accessible navigation menu that is shown/hidden with a button

tests.title: Navigation with Button to Expand Subnav
tests.prefix: Using the items in the JavaScript object [{url:'/',label:'Home'},{url:'/products',label:'Products',subnav:[{url:'/products/frobs',label:'Frobs'},{url:'/products/thrips',label:'Thrips'}]},{url:'/services',label:'Services'}]

build a navigation menu where the subnav is expanded via a button

prompts: create the breadcrumb navigation for this page

prompts: generate a simple table
build a table

prompts: generate a table using column and row headers.
build a table. Include column and row headers.

build the “Our Teachers” table.

tests.title: Image
prompts: Insert photo.jpg with the alt “Photo description”

tests.title: Progressive Disclosure Singleton
prompts: Insert progressive disclosure with title “Short description” and a placeholder comment where I should put the contents.
Details & summary with title “Short description” and a placeholder comment where I should put the contents.
Accessible progressive disclosure with title “Short description” and a placeholder comment where I should put the contents.

tests.title: Progressive Disclosure Singleton (Expanded)
prompts: Insert an open progressive disclosure with title “Short description” and a placeholder comment where I should put the contents.
Details & summary (open) with title “Short description” and a placeholder comment where I should put the contents.
Accessible progressive disclosure (open) with title “Short description” and a placeholder comment where I should put the contents.

tests.title: Progressive Disclosure Group
prompts: Insert a series of progressive disclosures with title “Section 1” and “Section 2.” Put a placeholder comment where I should put the contents of each.
Details & summary for each of “Section 1” and “Section 2” with a placeholder comment where I should put the contents.
Accessible progressive disclosures with titles “Section 1” and “Section 2.” Insert a placeholder comment where I should put the contents of each.

tests.title: Progressive Disclosure Group (First Expanded)
prompts: Insert a series of progressive disclosures with title “Section 1” and “Section 2.” Put a placeholder comment where I should put the contents of each. The first one should be open.
Details & summary for each of “Section 1” and “Section 2” with a placeholder comment where I should put the contents. Open the first one by default.
Accessible progressive disclosures with titles “Section 1” and “Section 2.” Insert a placeholder comment where I should put the contents of each. The first one should be open.

tests.title: Progressive Disclosure Group – One Open at a Time
prompts: Insert a series of mutually-exclusive progressive disclosures with title “Section 1” and “Section 2.” Put a placeholder comment where I should put the contents of each.
Details & summary for each of “Section 1” and “Section 2” with a placeholder comment where I should put the contents. Only one should be able to be open at a time.
Accessible progressive disclosures with titles “Section 1” and “Section 2.” Insert a placeholder comment where I should put the contents of each. Ensure only one is open at a time.

tests.title: Modal Dialog
prompts: Insert a modal dialog and a button to open it. Use placeholder content for the button and dialog content.
Insert a modal dialog and a button to open it. Use placeholder content for the button and dialog content. Ensure it is accessible.

tests.title: Modal Dialog with Form
prompts: Insert a modal dialog containing a form and a button to open it. Use placeholder content for the button and form content.
Insert a modal dialog containing a form and a button to open it. Use placeholder content for the button and form content. Ensure it is accessible.

tests.title: Popover Dialog
prompts: Insert a popover non-modal dialog containing a form and a button to open it. Use placeholder content for the button and form content.
Insert a popover non-modal dialog containing a form and a button to open it. Use placeholder content for the button and form content. Ensure it is accessible.

tests.title: Progress
prompts: Insert a progress indicator for upload progress. Current value: 70%
Progress indicator: 70%
Accessible progress indicator: 70%
